-------file: ("./fixtures/replace3.txt")
-------options: [text?padleft=# ]
// BUILD_INCLUDE("./fixtures/replace3.txt")[text?padleft=# ]

-------file: ("./fixtures/replace3.txt")
-------options: [text?padleft=# &before=This is injected before\nAlso this is injected before\n]
// BUILD_INCLUDE("./fixtures/replace3.txt")[text?padleft=# &before=This is injected before\nAlso this is injected before\n]

-------file: ("./fixtures/replace3.txt")
-------options: [text?padleft=# ,breakstring?width=100&flags=word]
// BUILD_INCLUDE("./fixtures/replace3.txt")[text?padleft=# ,breakstring?width=100&flags=word]

-------file: ("./fixtures/replace3.txt")
-------options: [text?before=# \u{1F913}\n# \u{1F44C}\n&padleft=#\u2014\u{1F600}\u2014,breakstring?width=50&flags=word]
// BUILD_INCLUDE("./fixtures/replace3.txt")[text?before=# \u{1F913}\n# \u{1F44C}\n&padleft=#\u2014\u{1F600}\u2014,breakstring?width=50&flags=word]
